hadiths.text: Furai'ah bint Malik, the sister of Abu Sa'eed Al-Khudri, said:"My husband died in Al-Qadum, so I went to the Prophet and told him that our house was remote." He gave her permission then he called her back and said: "Stay in your house for four months and ten days, until the term prescribed is fulfilled

chapter.ara-name: باب عِدَّةِ الْمُتَوَفَّى عَنْهَا زَوْجُهَا مَنْ يَوْمِ يَأْتِيهَا الْخَبَرُ
chapter.eng-name: The 'Iddah Of A Woman Whose Husband Has Died, Starts From The Day The News Reached Her
